entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
